meanings.sent1: Moi went to the store to buy some apples.
meanings.sent2: Can you pass the salt to moi, please?
meanings.sent3: Moi tried to juggle three oranges and failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: In the mirror, moi saw a reflection of determination.
meanings.sent5: The teacher praised moi for completing the assignment on time.

meanings.sent1: I made the sandwich all by moi.
meanings.sent2: Moi needs to take care of moi when feeling sick.
meanings.sent3: Moi decided to treat myself to a movie night.
meanings.sent4: After the long day, moi relaxed in a warm bath.
meanings.sent5: The cat groomed itself while moi watched in amusement.
